articles.title: Corals and cable cars: Vietnam tourist island Phu Quoc reopens with big dreams - CNA
articles.description: PHU QUOC, Vietnam: Tour guide Lai Chi Phuc has been counting down the days until travellers return to the white-sand beaches and thick tropical jungle of Vietnam's Phu Quoc, a once-poor fishing island pushing to be Asia's next holiday hotspot as COVID-19 pand…
articles.content: Ahead of Saturday's reopening, staff at Vinpearl resort - where the arrivals are staying - swept beaches, arranged cutlery on tables and laid out sunbeds. Others busied themselves painting delicate f… [+1942 chars]

articles.title: Asia markets: Alibaba fiscal Q2 earnings, oil prices, currencies - CNBC
articles.description: Alibaba on Thursday missed revenue and earnings expectations for the September quarter, as slowing economic growth in China weighed on results.
articles.content:
